mapper.insert: insert into direct_message (dm_id, send_id, receive_id, message, timestamp, read_check) values (#{dm_id}, #{send_id}, #{receive_id}, #{message}, now(), false)
mapper.delete: delete from direct_message where dm_id = #{dm_id} and timestamp = #{timestamp}
mapper.select: select * from direct_message where (dm_id = #{dm_id} and send_id = #{user_id}) or (dm_id = #{dm_id} and receive_id = #{user_id})
mapper.update: update direct_message set read_check = true where dm_id = #{dm_id} and receive_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from direct_message where dm_id = #{dm_id} and receive_id = #{user_id} and read_check = false
mapper.delete: delete from direct_message where datediff(now(), timestamp) > 30
